channel.title: Hyperion by Graham (Crackers) - Stability/Playability
channel.description:
I have 2 questions, one I think might not go here but I didnt see a client help section(sorry if there is, I couldn't find it :(
ok so, 1.) Hyperion(Graham's framework) is it stable? Because I read somewhere that there are some Stability/patches for it so I want to make sure its cool before I start with it.
&
2.) Can I just use the moparscape client with it or should I look for Graham's Client(if there is one I didn't see it)?
